name: angular-pouchdb-logger
description: Enables logging to web database via pouchdb and $log delegate. The library is Ionic-aware and autoselect the best db for each platform

scripts.pretest: eslint src/*.js && eslint test/*.js && nsp check
scripts.build:add: git add dist/*.js && git commit -m 'chore(build): updated distribution package'
scripts.changelog:add: git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'docs(changelog): updated CHANGELOG.md'
scripts.release:pre: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.release:post: npm run changelog && npm run changelog:add
scripts.release:major: npm run release:pre && npm version major && npm run release:post && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm run version-and-push
scripts.release:minor: npm run release:pre && npm version minor && npm run release:post && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm run version-and-push
scripts.release:patch: npm run release:pre && npm version patch && npm run release:post && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm run version-and-push
scripts.version-and-push: git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm run publish-and-merge
scripts.publish-and-merge: git checkout master && git merge develop && git push && git checkout develop && npm publish
